structure.unit: ARTICLE XIVA. WATER SUPPLY FOR FIRE SUPPRESSION

text.section:
Sec. 2-103.23. Review of decisions.
Whenever any person is aggrieved by any decision of the Miami-Dade County Fire Department or Fire Department having jurisdiction as to the enforcement of and it may appeal said decision within fifteen (15) days to the Environmental Quality Control Board pursuant to the procedures contained in of this Code.
